function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Using satellite imagery data without proper validation or ground truthing","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of tree canopy cover and overall greenness","Mitigation":"Validate satellite imagery data with ground truthing and field measurements","Technologies":"Ground truthing, field measurements","People":"Researchers, data analysts","Owner":"Research team, data collection team"},{"Description":"Potential bias in the classification of urban-rural levels based on outdated scheme","Impact":"Misclassification of urbanicity levels leading to erroneous conclusions","Mitigation":"Update the urban-rural classification scheme to reflect current trends and population distribution","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis tools, updated demographic data","People":"Geographers, demographers, data analysts","Owner":"Geospatial analysis team, demographic data team"},{"Description":"Exclusion of confounding factors with VIF \\\\u2265 4 may lead to incomplete understanding of the impact of green space factors on infection rates","Impact":"Underestimation of the influence of confounding factors on infection rates, leading to misleading conclusions","Mitigation":"Use alternative statistical techniques to address multicollinearity, include relevant confounding factors in the analysis","Technologies":"Statistical software for multicollinearity analysis, data modeling tools","People":"Statisticians, data analysts","Owner":"Data analysis team"}]}
